title: How to Preserve Candied Jalapenos

steps.headline: Pour 4 pounds of sugar over the peppers and let them sit to make their own juice.
Put in saucepan and bring to a boil
Cook until peppers take on a candied look.
Pour into the jars and turn them upside down to seal.

text: Drain the jalapenos.  Pour 4 pounds of sugar over the peppers and let them sit to make their own juice.  Put in saucepan and bring to a boil  Cook until peppers take on a candied look.  Pour into the jars and turn them upside down to seal.  Wait two weeks before serving.
